name: Crush Square Mobile
description:
Discover Crush Square, our new game with a revolutionary principle. As for the rules, it couldn't be simpler: just try not to get crushed by the falling and stacking blocks! To survive, move around the world and climb on the stacks of cubes already present.

            Do you find the concept and the Gameplay too simple? Don't worry: several enemies with various and fun effects are there to complicate your task. Also remember to pick up any bonuses that drop before they get crushed. They could be more than useful to you and maybe even save your life like the double jump bonus which allows you to jump twice as high.

            Are you looking for the best score? Complete the missions to multiply your points and compete against the best scores of your friends.

            Enjoy the game however you want thanks to the three difficulty levels that will allow everyone to surpass themselves, achieve a new high score or relax.             Don't like the starter skin? That's not a problem, over 40 skins are available in the store. You just have to choose yours. In addition, some even have superpowers!
